data.title: David Franklin Robbins Obituary 2023
data.meta_description: David Franklin Robbins, 59, of Searcy passed away Monday, October 2, 2023 at CHI St. Vincent Infirmary in Little Rock. He was born December 4, 1963 in Searcy, Arkansas to the la...
data.text:
David Franklin Robbins, 59, of Searcy passed away Monday, October 2, 2023 at CHI St. Vincent Infirmary in Little Rock. He was born December 4, 1963 in Searcy, Arkansas to the late Charles and Maxine (Roberson) Robbins.

David was an amazing father not only to his kids but to numerous foster kids. His main goal in life was to care for his family and to see that his wife and kids never went without. He worked in HVAC for 37 years and in 1993 he started Robbins Services in Higginson, specializing in Heat and Air. He was a hard worker who loved helping people. Davidâ€™s favorite pass time was deer hunting, which he looked forward to every year. He was a loving husband, father, grandfather and friend who will be dearly missed.

Left to cherish his memory are his wife of 38 years, Becky Robbins; two sons, Anthony Jones (Jodie), and Jordan Robbins all of Searcy; nine daughters, Debbie Chapman (William) of Cabot, Amber Rice (Kevin) of Higginson, Ashton Robbins of Searcy, Andrea Robbins of Sherwood, Sedella Jefferson (Julius) of California, Amanda Robbins of Kensett, Brandi Robbins of Searcy, Krysta Ramsey of Sherwood, and Makayla Castera of Little Rock; one brother, Chuck Robbins (Donna) of Searcy; one sister-in-law, Jan Patterson (Eric) of Higginson; one brother-in-law, Malcolm McLain (Sonya) of Searcy; nineteen grandchildren; nine nieces and nephews, and numerous cousins and friends.

A memorial service will be held Monday, October 30, 2023, at 6:00 p.m. at the Revival Church in Searcy.

All Cremation Arrangements have been entrusted to Searcy McEuen Funeral Home.

Condolences may be left at www.SearcyMcEuenFuneralHome.com
